movie.title: Prayers for Bobby
movie.plot: Bobby Griffith was his mother's favorite son, the perfect all-American boy growing up under deeply religious influences in Walnut Creek, California. Bobby was also gay. Struggling with a conflict no one knew of much less understood Bobby finally came out to his family.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.
